attributes.action: face slavery charges if our children are forced to carry out community service
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Proposals to impel all teenagers to conduct 50 hours of community work before the age of 19 is akin to forced labour, which our great country outlawed decades ago. It is an insult that the many kids who choose to VOLUNTEER in our community will be lost in a crowd of their unwilling, unenthusiastic peers. Perhaps number 10 has a chimney that needs sweeping?

rejection.details:
Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. 
Please restrict the action to a function that Government can act upon. If you want the law changing, or new legislation introducing, please clearly state that.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
